Uses of Class
backend.Consumable

  • Packages that use Consumable 
    Package Description
    backend
    Provides necessary classes to create a functioning backend for a space explorers game
    backendGUIExtensions
    Provides necessary classes to extend backend for use with a GUI
    backendTesting
    Provides JUnit test cases for backend
    graphicalInterface
    Provides a GUI implementation of a space explorers game

    • Uses of Consumable in backend

      Subclasses of Consumable in backend 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  CureItem
      Allows the creation of cure items for removing the space plague from Crew Members.
      class  FoodItem
      Allows the creation of food items for decreasing a crew members hunger.
      class  MedicalItem
      Allows the creation of medical items for increasing a crew members health.
